identity.mission: Create a minimal, high-performance chat workspace that blends gaming aesthetics with Swiss design precision.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Gaming HUD meets Swiss Cleanliness.
Emotion First: Trust and Speed for visitors; Focus and Calm for agents.
Content is King: The conversation is the hero.
Zoom In: Focus on the message content.
Negative Space: generous padding to reduce cognitive load.

grid.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-[280px_1fr] lg:grid-cols-[280px_1fr_320px] h-screen overflow-hidden

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-full text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

inputs.base: flex h-12 w-full rounded-xl border border-input bg-background px-4 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

chat_bubbles.user: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm p-4 max-w-[85%] shadow-sm
chat_bubbles.agent: bg-muted text-foreground rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm p-4 max-w-[85%]

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Do not use default blue. Use the defined Primary Violet.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Mobile-first: The visitor chat must feel like a native app (100dvh).
Agent Dashboard: Dense but breathable. Use borders and subtle backgrounds to separate areas, not just whitespace.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl on sticky headers and chat input areas.
Animation: Use framer-motion for smooth message entry (slide up + fade in).
Theme: Support Light (Default) and Dark modes. Use 'dark:' classes.

setup: Update tailwind.config.js with the color palette and font families

pages.visitor_chat: Full screen, no scroll on body. Scrollable message area. Fixed bottom input. Header with agent status.
pages.agent_login: Clean, centered card on an abstract background.
pages.agent_dashboard: Sidebar layout. Left: Navigation. Middle: Chat List (scrollable). Right: Active Chat (flex-grow). Far Right (Optional): Customer Details.
